name: W Original Grand ShortWing Shoes - Men's
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features: Classic and dapper yet uniquely rich in color and texture, this collection is sure to infuse business casual with a much needed dose of panache.
Crafted in rich leathers, this progressive wingtip is one of the most lightweight dress shoes around.
OS technology for ultimate comfort, this style can be paired with cuffed dark denim and a plaid shirt for laid-back office attire, or a tailored suit for busy days filled with meetings.
